meta.settings.github_token.label: GitHub Token
meta.settings.github_token.description: Personal access token for GitHub API. Required for repository operations like creating branches and pull requests.
meta.settings.github_repository.label: GitHub Repository
meta.settings.github_repository.descript: The repository to work with in format 'owner/repo' (e.g., 'myuser/myproject').
meta.settings.openai_api_key.label: OpenAI API Key
meta.settings.openai_api_key.description: API key for OpenAI services. Used for AI-powered code generation and analysis.
meta.settings.litellm_api_key.label: LiteLLM API Key
meta.settings.litellm_api_key.descriptio: Alternative API key if using LiteLLM proxy for multiple LLM providers.
meta.settings.log_level.label: Log Level
meta.settings.log_level.description: Controls how much detail is written to logs. DEBUG shows everything, ERROR shows only errors.
meta.settings.app_lang.label: Application Language
meta.settings.app_lang.description: Language for bot messages and UI text.
meta.settings.prompt_path.label: Prompt File Path
meta.settings.prompt_path.description: Path to the YAML file containing the system prompt configuration.
meta.settings.web_user.label: Web UI Username
meta.settings.web_user.description: Username for accessing the web dashboard. Leave empty to disable authentication.
meta.settings.web_password.label: Web UI Password
meta.settings.web_password.description: Password for accessing the web dashboard. Leave empty to disable authentication.
